ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] RoK info (mild spoilers!)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Oh come on spoil us (or at least me)!!  What zone should I start looking in for this stuff? I know its not Karn s Castle, they seem to hate Bards there,
ygData.messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tork [mailto:tork_dropbox@...]
>
>
> Now, on to the good stuff:
> Our armor is Singing Steel, neon green plate - like Hero Bracer type green
> not drab ranger green. Yes Tork is sporting Singing Steel and loving it.
> ;)

> I got dawnchaser (first one on Nameless) this weekend, last night I got a
> near godly piercing weapon: Sacrdioan's (sp) Partisan! That time spent
> with the ol' obsidian shard to get to 200 was worth it - I'm a regular
> pigsticker with the new shoulder armor... um nevermind... =)
>

Oh come on spoil us (or at least me)!! What zone should I start looking in
for this stuff?

I know its not Karn's Castle, they seem to hate Bards there, nothing that we
saw that dropped there was equippable by bards except one cloak that was
all/all...

I'd gotten so bored with EQ, its great to be excited about playing again!!

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 51 Minstrel of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
